mission.headline: Our mission
mission.text: To provide help where it is most needed. Since 2008 we have helped individuals in great need and gave them an educational foundation.

education.headline: Education
education.text: Help for self help. We help children from poor backgrounds to achieve a high school degree!

meals.headline: Warm meals
meals.text: Studying is difficult with an empty stomach. We provide a daily warm meal to our students as well as to the elderly and fragile guests that visit our soup kitchen

donate.headline: Help now!
donate.text: A big part of the project was realized through donations and voluntary work. Thatâ€™s why we need your help. Participate now and help make big changes through a donation.
